query.not_found_board: Couldn't find that board, try selecting a board first.

interactions.no_server: This command can only be used in a server.
interactions.no_admin_perms: This command requires the "Manage Server" permission.
interactions.no_trello_perms: This command requires you to have the Trello management role or have the "Manage Server" permission.
interactions.wrong_user: ‚ùå Only the person who executed this command can do this.
interactions.delete_wrong_user: ‚ùå Only the person who executed this command can delete the response.
interactions.prompt_wrong_user: ‚ùå Only the person who executed this command can interact with this prompt.
interactions.prompt_no_function: üî• This type of prompt does not have a function. Contact support if you see this.
interactions.prompt_no_action_id: üî• No action ID was provided. Contact support if you see this.
interactions.prompt_no_action_id_or_type: üî• No action ID was provided. Contact support if you see this.
interactions.prompt_action_expired: ‚ùå The action to this prompt has expired, try again later.
interactions.prompt_action_invalid_type: üî• The action to this prompt has an invalid type. Contact support if you see this.
interactions.prompt_action_requires_data: üî• The action to this component requires data. Contact support if you see this.
interactions.modal_unknown: üî• This modad never linked anywhere. Contact support if you see this.
interactions.bad_subcommand: Invalid subcommand. Contact support if you see this.
interactions.error: An error occurred while handling this interaction.

auth.content: You can authenticate with Trello using the button below:
auth.no_auth: You must authenticate your Trello account to use this command.
auth.expired: Your authentication token has expired! Please re-authenticate to continue.

list.title: Cards in "{{list}}" ({{cards, number}})
list.none: No cards are in this list.

label.title: Cards in "{{label}}" ({{cards, number}})
label.none: No cards are assigned this label.

cleardata.confirm:
Are you sure you want to remove **ALL** of your user data?

‚Ä¢ Your locale settings will be removed.
‚Ä¢ Your authorization credentials will be removed.
‚Ä¢ Your Trello token will be invalidated.
‚Ä¢ Any webhooks you created will no longer work and will be required to be repaired.
cleardata.done: Your user data has been cleared.

clearauth.confirm:
Are you sure you want to remove your authentication data?

‚Ä¢ Your Trello token will be invalidated.
‚Ä¢ Any webhooks you created will no longer work and will be required to be repaired.

addlabel.limited: You have too many labels! Try editing other labels or deleting unused labels.

deletelabel.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the **{{label}}** label?

addlist.limited: You have too many lists! Try editing other archived lists.

edit.need_admin: You need administrator permissions on the board to do this!
edit.header_card: Made the following changes to the **{{name}}** card:
edit.header_list: Made the following changes to the **{{name}}** list:
edit.header_label: Made the following changes to the **{{name}}** label:
edit.header_board: Made the following changes to the **{{name}}** board:
edit.labels_placeholder: Select labels to add to this card‚Ä¶
edit.members_placeholder: Select members to add to this card‚Ä¶

addattachment.no_url: You need to provide either an attachment or a URL!
addattachment.done: Added an attachment to the **{{card}}** card.
addattachment.limited: You have too many attachments! Try deleting unnessesary attachments.

addcard.limited: You have too many cards! Try deleting unused cards.

deletecard.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the **{{card}}** card?

switch.no_board_command: Select a board to switch to before using this command!

server_settings.no_locale_set: This server has not set a locale.
server_settings.locale: This server's locale is set to **{{name}}**.
server_settings.role: The Trello management role is set to **{{role}}**.
server_settings.no_role_set: The Trello management role has not been set in this server.
server_settings.set_role: Set the Trello management role to **{{role}}**.

bot.info_content: **Taco** is a Discord bot that allows users to manage their Trello boards in Discord.
bot.donate_content: Support the development of Taco by becoming a supporter and be able to create extra webhooks!
bot.donate_extra: You can be a supporter via Patreon or from the Discord Store
bot.github_content: You can view the open-source GitHub repository of this bot by clicking the button below!
bot.invite_content: You can invite me to other servers by clicking the button below!
bot.support_content: You can join the support server from this invite: {{invite}}

webhook.dwh_fail: Couldn't fetch Discord webhooks! Make sure I have the `Manage Webhooks` permission.
webhook.dwh_fail_create: Couldn't create a Discord webhook! Make sure I have the `Manage Webhooks` permission in the selected channel.
webhook.repair_header: This webhook has the following issues:
webhook.trello_member_missing: > ‚Ä¢ Couldn't find the user who created the webhook!
webhook.discord_webhook_missing: > ‚Ä¢ Couldn't find the connected Discord webhook!
webhook.repair_footer: You can fix these issues with `/webhook repair`
webhook.delete_confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete the **{{webhook}}** webhook?
Note: Deleting a webhook will **not** delete the Discord webhook.
webhook.board_unauthorized: You don't have permission to view this board!
webhook.max: You have reached your maximum webhooks for this server! You can increase this limit by becoming a supporter!
webhook.select_webhook: Select a Discord webhook to use, or choose to create a new one.
webhook.select_webhook_max: There are too many webhooks on this channel! Choose an existing one to use.
webhook.no_dwh_available: Multiple other applications have too many webhooks in this channel. Consider removing Discord webhooks in this channel you no longer use.
webhook.wh_expire: This webhook is unavailable since it exceeds your current webhook limit! You can increase this limit by becoming a supporter!
webhook.add_wh_content: This webhook for the Trello board **{{name}}** has started! Events should be showing up shortly‚Ä¶
webhook.set_style: Set the webhook's display style to **{{style}}**.
webhook.set_filter_policy: Set the webhook's filter policy to **{{policy}}**.
webhook.set_active: Activated the webhook. Events will display from the Discord webhook.
webhook.set_inactive: Deactivated the webhook. Events will no longer display from the Discord webhook.
webhook.filters_placeholder: Select filters to use in this webhook‚Ä¶
webhook.view_group_placeholder: Select a filter group to use‚Ä¶
webhook.cards_placeholder: Select the cards to filter in this webhook‚Ä¶
webhook.lists_placeholder: Select the lists to filter in this webhook‚Ä¶
webhook.twh_repair_failed: Failed to repair the internal webhook! Make sure you have access to the board on your Trello account!
webhook.repair_done: Any issues with the webhook have been repaired.
webhook.dwh_fail_no_channel: Couldn't recreate a Discord webhook, make sure there is a channel that does not have webhooks from other applications!
webhook.select_channel: Seems like the Discord webhook for this webhook is missing. Select a Discord channel to post events to.
webhook.repair_wh_content: The webhook **{{name}}** has been repaired! Events should be showing up again shortly‚Ä¶
webhook.choose_lists: Choose which lists will be filtered. Choosing no lists will disable list filtering.
webhook.choose_cards: Choose which cards will be filtered. Choosing no cards will disable card filtering.

default.name: Default
default.description: Regular messages, showing as much information as possible

small.name: Small
small.description: Small version of default webhooks, only showing the descriptive title

compact.name: Compact
compact.description: Stacks multiple events into one embed, much like GitHub webhook commits
